name: Destiny: Rising
storyline: Destiny: Rising delves into an unseen era where burgeoning hope blooms once again after a terrifying collapse of civilization and the dangers of the resulting Dark Age. With the help of legendary Iron Lords, humanity has broken free the shackles of tyranny and began to rally together against the alien forces intent on its extinction. Amidst the chaos of this early age for The City, a new generation of Lightbearers, resurrected by mysterious entities known as Ghosts, set out to restore humanity's prominence and secure its future.
summary: Enter an era of heroes and legends set within the rich tapestry of the Destiny Universe, where you will meet both familiar faces and intriguing new characters. Experience top-tier sci-fi shooting action in the franchise’s first mobile game as you embark on a new adventure in an alternate Destiny timeline. Play as these unique characters to defend future Earth and reclaim humanity's future!
